page.title: 06 THE NEW VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The new village hall is extremely big. In the hall you can play different sports like badminton, roller booting, football and keep fit. The caretaker of the hall is Dawn Wright who keeps it clean, apart from the bar and Tony Wressell looks after that.There are {a lot of weekly events that take place at the hall like play school, youth club, discos and dances.The{old hall {was knocked down about two years ago and then the new started emerging. Soon it was built and was opened in 1984 by Mick Hyde as he did alot of the work and is now chairman of the committee.There are alot of rooms in the hall.There's the{snooker room,bar, {kitchen,cloakrooms,seating area}and of course the{main hall.}Some people hold their wedding receptions,anniversary and other parties there.It's a big improvement on the old fashioned hall.
